entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING , Barrie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 5:16 PM EST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -8.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Simcoe Regional Airport 12:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Temperature: -8.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.7 kPa rising
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -17
Dewpoint: -11.2°C
Wind: WSW 24 km/h gust 38 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Saturday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Temperature steady near minus 7.
